mapper.select:
select t.*, (f.id is null) as favour, 'cloudAccount' as type from cloud_account t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.*, (f.id is null) as favour, 'vulnAccount' as type from cloud_account t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.id, t.name, t.server_group_id, t.plugin_icon, t.status, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.creator, t.ip, t.port, t.user_name, t.password, t.is_proxy, t.proxy_id, (f.id is null) as favour, 'serverAccount' as type from server t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.id, t.name, t.plugin_icon, t.status, t.image_url, t.image_tag, t.path, t.create_time, (f.id is null) as favour, 'imageAccount' as type from image t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.*, (f.id is null) as favour, 'codeAccount' as type from code t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.*, (f.id is null) as favour, 'fsAccount' as type from file_system t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.*, (f.id is null) as favour, 'k8sAccount' as type from cloud_native t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.*, (f.id is null) as favour, 'configAccount' as type from cloud_native_config t left join favorite f on t.id = f.source_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, t.plugin_icon as icon, t.severity, t1.id as accountId, t1.name as accountName, 'cloudAccount' as accountType from rule t left join cloud_account t1 on t.plugin_id = t1.plugin_id LEFT JOIN plugin p on t.plugin_id = p.id
AND t1.id = #{accountId}
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
and p.type = 'cloud'
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, t.plugin_icon as icon, t.severity, t1.id as accountId, t1.name as accountName, 'vulnAccount' as accountType from rule t left join cloud_account t1 on t.plugin_id = t1.plugin_id LEFT JOIN plugin p on t.plugin_id = p.id
AND t1.id = #{accountId}
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
and p.type = 'vuln'
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, 'server.png' as icon, t.severity, (select id from server where id = #{accountId}) as accountId, (select name from server where id = #{accountId}) as accountName, 'serverAccount' as accountType from server_rule t
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, 'k8s.png' as icon, t.severity, (select id from cloud_native where id = #{accountId}) as accountId, (select name from cloud_native where id = #{accountId}) as accountName, 'k8sAccount' as accountType from cloud_native_rule t
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, 'yaml.png' as icon, t.severity, (select id from cloud_native_config where id = #{accountId}) as accountId, (select name from cloud_native_config where id = #{accountId}) as accountName, 'configAccount' as accountType from cloud_native_config_rule t
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, 'docker.png' as icon, t.severity, (select id from image where id = #{accountId}) as accountId, (select name from image where id = #{accountId}) as accountName, 'imageAccount' as accountType from image_rule t
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, 'code.png' as icon, t.severity, (select id from code where id = #{accountId}) as accountId, (select name from code where id = #{accountId}) as accountName, 'codeAccount' as accountType from code_rule t
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
order by t.last_modified desc

select t.id as sourceId, 'rule' as ruleType, t.name as ruleName, t.description as ruleDesc, 'fs.png' as icon, t.severity, (select id from file_system where id = #{accountId}) as accountId, (select name from file_system where id = #{accountId}) as accountName, 'fsAccount' as accountType from file_system_rule t
AND t.name like CONCAT('%', #{ruleName},'%')
order by t.last_modified desc
SELECT t.tag_key as tagKey FROM rule_tag t WHERE tag_key IN (SELECT tag_key FROM rule_tag_mapping WHERE rule_id = #{id})

SELECT t.*, (select tag_key from rule_tag_mapping where rule_id = t.id limit 1) as tagKey, (select tag_name from rule_tag_mapping m left join rule_tag g on m.tag_key = g.tag_key where rule_id = t.id limit 1) as tagName FROM rule t LEFT JOIN plugin p on t.plugin_id = p.id
AND t.id = #{sourceId}
and p.type = 'cloud'
ORDER BY t.last_modified desc

SELECT t.*, (select tag_key from rule_tag_mapping where rule_id = t.id limit 1) as tagKey, (select tag_name from rule_tag_mapping m left join rule_tag g on m.tag_key = g.tag_key where rule_id = t.id limit 1) as tagName FROM rule t LEFT JOIN plugin p on t.plugin_id = p.id
AND t.id = #{sourceId}
and p.type = 'vuln'
ORDER BY t.last_modified desc

SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id join cloud_account t3 on t2.plugin_id = t3.plugin_id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t3.id = #{accountId}
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join server_rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t.tag_key = 'serverAccount'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join cloud_native_rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t.tag_key = 'k8sAccount'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join cloud_native_config_rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t.tag_key = 'configAccount'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join image_rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t.tag_key = 'imageAccount'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join code_rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t.tag_key = 'codeAccount'
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT t2.id, t2.name, t2.status, t2.severity, t2.description, t2.parameter, t2.last_modified as lastModified, t2.flag, t2.script FROM rule_tag t left join rule_tag_mapping t1 on t.tag_key = t1.tag_key join file_system_rule t2 on t1.rule_id = t2.id
AND t.tag_key = #{sourceId}
AND t.tag_key = 'fsAccount'

SELECT t.*, t1.name as userName FROM task t left join user t1 on t1.id = t.apply_user
and t.id = #{request.id}
and LOWER(t.task_name) like CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{request.taskName}),'%')
and LOWER(t.description) like CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{request.description}),'%')
and LOWER(t1.name) like CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{request.userName}),'%')
ORDER BY t.create_time desc
SELECT t.* FROM task_item_resource t WHERE t.task_id = #{id} order by t.id desc
SELECT t1.*, t3.name as accountName FROM history_cloud_task t1 JOIN task_item_resource t2 on t2.resource_id = t1.id JOIN cloud_account t3 on t3.id = t1.account_id WHERE t2.task_id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM resource t JOIN cloud_task_item_resource t1 on t.id = t1.resource_id JOIN history_cloud_task t2 on t1.task_id = t2.id JOIN task_item_resource t3 on t3.resource_id = t2.id WHERE t3.task_id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM resource_item t JOIN cloud_task_item_resource t1 on t.resource_id = t1.resource_id JOIN history_cloud_task t2 on t1.task_id = t2.id JOIN task_item_resource t3 on t3.resource_id = t2.id WHERE t3.task_id = #{id}
SELECT t1.*, t3.name as accountName FROM history_vuln_task t1 JOIN task_item_resource t2 on t2.resource_id = t1.id JOIN cloud_account t3 on t3.id = t1.account_id WHERE t2.task_id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM resource t JOIN cloud_task_item_resource t1 on t.id = t1.resource_id JOIN history_vuln_task t2 on t1.task_id = t2.id JOIN task_item_resource t3 on t3.resource_id = t2.id WHERE t3.task_id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM resource_item t JOIN cloud_task_item_resource t1 on t.resource_id = t1.resource_id JOIN history_vuln_task t2 on t1.task_id = t2.id JOIN task_item_resource t3 on t3.resource_id = t2.id WHERE t3.task_id = #{id}
SELECT t.* FROM history_server_result t JOIN task_item_resource t1 on t1.resource_id = t.id WHERE t1.task_id = #{id}
SELECT t.* FROM history_image_result t JOIN task_item_resource t1 on t1.resource_id = t.id WHERE t1.task_id = #{id}
SELECT t.* FROM history_code_result t JOIN task_item_resource t1 on t1.resource_id = t.id WHERE t1.task_id = #{id}
SELECT t.* FROM code_result_item t JOIN history_code_result t1 on t1.id = t.result_id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
SELECT t.* FROM history_file_system_result t JOIN task_item_resource t1 on t1.resource_id = t.id WHERE t1.task_id = #{id}
SELECT t.* FROM file_system_result_item t JOIN history_file_system_result t1 on t1.id = t.result_id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
